sections.title: MBBS Admission In Himachal Pradesh 2025-26, Colleges Seat Matrix, Fee Structure, Application Process, Cut-Off And Counselling

content.content: Himachal Pradesh is a bustling center of industry, innovation, and education, celebrated for its vibrant culture, storied past, and significant economic contributions to india. its capital.

Renowned as a premier destination for medical education in india, Himachal Pradesh offers a plethora of undergraduate and postgraduate medical programs, drawing students from all corners of the nation. admission to mbbs programs in Himachal Pradesh is conducted through the neet exam, with successful candidates participating in state counseling for enrollment.

The mbbs curriculum in Himachal Pradesh spans 5.5 years, comprising 4.5 years of academic study and 1 year of compulsory internship, providing students with comprehensive training and practical experience.

There are 8 MBBS colleges in Himachal Pradesh offering MBBS course. The admissions will be granted to 920 total MBBS seats in Himachal Pradesh 2025 on the basis of NEET score obtained by the candidate and other factors. Of these 8, 7 are government medical college in Himachal Pradesh for MBBS and one is a private medical college. As a result, a majority of the total MBBS seats in Himachal Pradesh 2025 is available in government medical colleges. Speaking numerically, there are total 770 government MBBS seats in HP 2025, and 150 private college seats being offered for Himachal Pradesh MBBS admission 2025.

Speaking of postgraduate options, there are 3 medical colleges offering about 310 seats in MD/MS/Diploma program. Furthering towards, super specialty programs, there is only 1 college i.e. Indira Gandhi Medical College, Shimla that offers precisely 7 seats in DM/MCH programs.

content.table:
Application modeOnline

Examination AuthorityNational Testing Agency (NTA)
Number of SeatsMBBS- 920 (State Quota)
Admission ProcessThe admission process will be conducted through online counselling by the NEET UG Medical and Dental Admission and Counseling Board, himachal Pradesh.
+91 80946-06060
Rounds of State CounsellingThere will be Four Rounds of Counselling for the state quota seats. The first round of counselling will be held in July 2023, the second round in August 2023, and the Third & Fourth Round in September 2023.
Selection CriteriaCandidates will be selected based on their NEET-UG score and the reservation criteria.
Top MBBS CollegesDr Rajendra Prasad Government Medical College, Maharishi Markandeshwar, Indira Gandhi Medical College, Dr. Y. S. Parmar Medical College Nahan, Pt. Jawahar Lal Nehru Government Medical College and Hospital, Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri Government Medical College & Hospital

content.content: Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admission is conducted by the Directorate of Medical Education and Research, Shimla. Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admission 2024 is done based on the NEET results. The NEET UG 2025 will be conducted on May 05, 2025.
NTA has released the NEET Application Form for all candidates seeking MBBS Admission 2025. Candidates can fill out the NEET UG Application Form from February 09 – March 16, 2025.

MBBS is a 5 years and 6 months undergraduate medical course. The Himachal Pradesh NEET Counselling notification for the current is yet to be released. Candidates will be able to register for the MBBS NEET Counselling and fill out the application form @amruhp.ac.in to seek Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admission 2025.

content.content: The NEET cutoff is determined based on various factors such as the number of applicants, the difficulty level of the exam, and the availability of seats in medical and dental colleges. It varies for different categories like General, OBC, SC, ST, and others. Each state and college may also have its own cutoff scores. Generally, higher cutoffs are seen in prestigious colleges and for popular courses. It’s crucial for aspiring medical students to keep track of cutoff trends and prepare accordingly

content.content: The first thing applicants must do is Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admission registration via MCC or HPU application (subject to the Quota with which the candidate is applying). Either way, the candidates must complete the registration by providing the personal details, contact details, program they’re applying for and other essential details.

The next step is to fill the Himachal Pradesh MBBS admission application form and enter academic details such as the score obtained in NEET UG, percentage in 10th and 12th standard. After doing so, the candidates must further into the Himachal Pradesh MBBS admission process and upload documents pertinent to the Himachal Pradesh MBBS admission application process. The documents need to be uploaded can be found in the ‘DOCUMENTS REQUIRED’ section ahead. The last step to complete the application process is to pay the requisite amount that goes towards application cum counseling fee. Applicants are advised to keep with themselves a couple or more printouts of the Himachal Pradesh MBBS admission application form for future reference.

sections.title: Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admissions 2025: Eligibility Criteria

content.content: The candidates who fulfil the following criteria will be considered for Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admissions 2025.

content.list:
• Candidates must be a domicile of Himachal Pradesh
  • Candidates must have passed their 10+2 examination in the Science stream.
  • The candidates must have qualified for NEET UG-2025.
  • The candidate should have completed 17 years of age as on December 31, 2024.
  • Must have passed 12th Standard exams with subjects of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and English and have secured minimum 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Biology in case he/she is from unreserved category, and minimum 40% marks if he/she hails from a reserved category.

content.content: The step-by-step procedure for application is as follows:

content.list:
• Visit the official website @amruhp.ac.in
  • Download the application form, and fill it with all the required information.
  • Upload all the necessary documents 
  • Submit the application form and pay the application fee

content.content: Please find the list of the documents required for the procedure of admission to MBBS colleges in Himachal Pradesh

content.list:
• 10th and 12th standard certificate
  • 10th and 12th standard mark sheet
  • Character certificate
  • NEET hall ticket
  • NEET Score card
  • Birth certificate
  • Identity proof (Aadhaar card,Driving License,Passport,Voter ID)
  • 10 Passport sized photographs (The photograph must be the same as those used in the NEET application form and hall ticket)
  • Printout of the application form

• Reservation category certificate
  • Domicile certificate
  • PWD (Persons With Disability)certificate
  • Gap period affidavit
  • Income certificate
  • Freedom fighter certificate

sections.title: Category Reservation In MBBS Admission Himachal Pradesh

content.content: The MBBS colleges in Himachal Pradesh include both government colleges and private colleges. The reservation policy for government medical colleges differs from that of private medical college in Himachal Pradesh. The former maintains a seat ratio of 85:15 for state quota students and All India quota students respectively. On the other hand, the latter divide the seats equally among State quota students and management students. For reservation based on caste and other categories, check the table below.
As you know about MBBS App is well known Career Guidance and Educational Consultant Rajasthan India, Offers three valuable tools for medical students in India. Those who have giving NEET exam.
MBBS App, a reputable educational consultancy based in Rajasthan, India, offers three essential tools tailored for students who have appeared for the NEET exam in India.

NEET 2024 College Predictor: This tool assists aspiring medical students by providing insights into potential medical colleges based on their NEET scores. With the competition for seats in medical institutions growing fiercer, this tool helps students find suitable colleges aligned with their performance.

NEET 2024 Rank Predictor: The rank predictor tool helps aspiring medical students estimate their potential rank based on their NEET performance. In the competitive landscape of medical admissions, this tool offers candidates a realistic projection of their standing among their peers.
Question: Who conducts the admission for HP NEET MBBS admission?
Answer: The Atal Medical & Research University, Himachal Pradesh is the authority that will conduct the  HP MBBS admission.
Question: When will the authority begin the HP MBBS admission?
Answer: The registration date for HP MBBS admission is yet to be released soon.
Question: Do I need to qualify for NEET to get admission to HP medical colleges?
Answer: Yes, in order to pursue MBBS in any HP college, one must qualify for NEET.
Question: Who can apply for HP MBBS admission?
Answer: Applicants who have qualified neet are eligible to apply for HP MBBS admission The detailed eligibility criteria are mentioned in the article above.
Question: What is the application form fee for HP MBBS admission?

Answer: The HP MBBS application form fee for General/NRI/OBC & other categories is Rs 2000 and for SC/ST/PH it is Rs 1000. The fee can be paid online using credit/debit cards and net banking through HDFC bank or SBI-payment gateway.
Question. How many Medical Colleges are there in Himachal Pradesh?
Answer. There are several Medical and dental Colleges in Himachal Pradesh.
Question. What score do I need to qualify for Himachal Pradesh MBBS 2025 admissions?
Ans. Candidates must score at least the 50th percentile to qualify for Himachal Pradesh MBBS 2025 admissions.
Question. What is the total duration of an MBBS course in Himachal Pradesh?
Answer. MBBS is a 5.5 years course with a mandatory 6 month internship
Question. What is the official website of Himachal Pradesh MBBS Admission?
Answer. The official website of HP MBBS Admission is @amruhp.ac.in
